text: Ten Mile Junction LRT Station (BP14) is an LRT station in Singapore. It is along the Bukit Panjang LRT Line. Services are provided at a lower frequency than other LRT stations. Trains only arrive every 20 minutes. ==Timeline== *6 November 1999: Station opened *10 December 2010: Station closed *30 December 2011: Station reopened ==Former Codes== Formerly the code was: A14 (1999 - 2001) ==Following Stations== Previous: Bukit Panjang (BP6/DT1) Next: N/A Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Ten Mile Junction LRT Station
